short_summary: the purchase, delivery and installation of Office Furniture
description: 1. This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Categories of the SA:- Product Category 1 - Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems;- Product Category 2 - Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products;- Product Category 3 - Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets;- Product Category 5 - Ancillary and Lighting Products;- Product Category 6 ? Support Space ? Collaborative Furniture;This requirement also contains products that are NON-SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT.2. Environment and Climate Change Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of Office Furniture to Quebec, (Quebec) by February 28th, 2023.3. This NPP covers a requirement to be solicited amongst the General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders).4. This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement(CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement and the World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).
tags: Notices INVITEMENT À DES PRESTATAIRES DU GOVERNMENT DU CANADA
Invitation à soumissionner en six Langues | Bilingual Request for Proposal
full_summary:
### Furniture Tender Announcement

**Reference:** PW-22-01004235

**Publication Date:** August 12, 2022

**Closing Date:** August 31, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)

**Location:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Supply Agreement:** E60PQ-140003/C

The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for office furniture, covering Product Categories 1, 2, 3, 5, and 6 of the Supply Arrangement E60PQ-140003/C. The requirement includes:

1. Interconnecting panels and freestanding systems
2. Height-adjustable desk/table products
3. Metal filing and storage cabinets
4. Ancillary and lighting products
5. Collaborative furniture

The solicitation is open to all general stream suppliers (holders of the Supply Arrangement) and is subject to the following Trade Agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Submission Requirements:**

* Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Government of Canada's electronic tendering system
* Evaluation will be conducted by a multi-member evaluation committee
* Criteria for evaluation will be outlined in the solicitation documents

**Contact Information:**

* Samri, Moufid, Procurement Contact
* Tel: 438-818-0818
* Email: moufid.samri@ec.gc.ca
* Address: 105 McGill - 5th Floor, Montreal, QC H2Y 2E7

### Document Attachments

To access the solicitation documents and attachments, please visit the links below:

* Solicitation Documents
* List of Required Products (Non-Supply Arrangement)
* Installation Plan for Quebec

Note: The links above are active, and you can access the solicitation documents and attachments by clicking on the respective
